data.message: facebook please help my cousin she already submit 2 valid id but no rply,3 weeks no rply account disable why?when she creat new account disable again!

replies.message: Hi Charma. If your cousin has submitted her information to our team, please tell her to hang tight as we take the time to review the information. We appreciate her patience! -Anna
